verbs.description: [V: ikea] [ARG1: the story behind how the store got its name] everyone knows ikea as the go - to store for trendy home furnishings but few know how and why the furniture store got its unique name ingvar kamprad elmtaryd agunnaryd elmtaryd justin laneeparexshutterstockeveryone ingvar kamprad
